resources.string: We are waiting for server response message, make sure you have a working internet connection, you can contact us in email at pacxman305@gmail.com
Your data connection is turned off, turn on data connection to get newer lessons.\nUnless you will not get newer lessons.

NO INTERNET CONNECTION

Your device is not connected to internet. You will start using this app, when we had successfully configured your device.

Please turn on your data connection and restart this app.

Sabbath School Discuss want to download Bible plugin file, this file help you to read all Bible verses given.

If you want to do it later, you will go in menu and choose "Bible plugin" option to install it.

Do you want to download it now?

This plugin is already installed, but you can download it to install latest plugin.

This will also remove the previous installed plugin

Do you want to download this plugin file?
Click on menu button choose Settings and click Font size to set your favorite font size
You can read text in night mode, just click menu button choose Settings and click on Night mode
You can set your favorite daily study notification time in Settings.
Sabbath School Quarterlies and its based materials are the properties of the Seventh Day Adventist church organization, we share current lesson for social discussions and review purpose.
Inside story, is a part of Sabbath School which tells some stories or testimonies.\n\nSabbath School Discuss may post some stories or testimonies which is not part of current Inside story.
For sharing your comment or question you must have a username, but actually you do not have it.

Sabbath School and Personal ministry\n\nPersonal Ministries is a facet of the church whose origin can be traced to the beginning of Seventh-day Adventist® history in the 1860s. It endeavors to inspire, motivate, equip, train, and mobilize all members.
Do really you want to close this application?
Do not forget to share your comment or question!\n\nDo you want quit?
Failed to access website, no resources provided!\n\nClose this session and try again
We share some posts on our facebook page, please like or visit our facebook page.\n\nClick on visit button below
We require access storage permission to be granted, we need it only to read or write app\'s data file on device storage, click button bellow and make sure you grant it to us.
We use ads to help this project
Set to use in night mode
Do you want to close this application?
Currently no further information provided about this quarter.
This username already exist, please choose another
It\'s looks like you don\'t have a valid account, try reinstalling this app!
User name can\'t be blank, contains only digits or white space or a dot
Old name does not match with current account, try reinstalling this app
Do you want to change your username?\n\nYour current username is
The name you\'ve chosen already exist, try another one
The username provided is the same as your current username.\n\nWe can\'t proceed to change username.
Set custom font type to use
encounter an error while trying to notify you
Click and hold on your favorite text to highlight or share it
We\'re sorry to inform you that you are no longer allowed to use this application, for further explanation please send us your email at pacxman305@gmail.com
Move lesson title at the top automatically
Introduction about this quarter is currently available, and probably you didn\'t read it, please take a time and read it!
You can retrieve all the verses you have read, go in \"Menu choose More and choose Opened references\".
Save all references you open automatically
This change may affect reference appearance, you will have to change reference color if it is not clearly visible
A new version of this app is available, click on download button to download it, data charges will be applied.
A new version of this app is available. Please connect to the internet to proceed the download.
Connection to internet failed!\n\nConnect to active internet connection and restart this app or click on \"Retry\" button below
Go to lesson where this comment was written on?
Currently our library is empty, try to refresh this page!
It seems there is an error while loading content, please try to refresh content!
We show mission icon to let you know about the currently ongoing mission, you will not be able to see such updates by disabling this option. We recommend you to enable this feature
A new version of this app is available.

Our purpose is to connect with all Sabbath School Students (Kinyarwanda), to maintain a most easy way such that every student will come in Sabbath School class with a clue to the ongoing quarter lesson.\n\nThis app is free to use, no hidden cost for any feature will be charged to the user, but the development,maintenance and costs of this project as is, is self charged, We hope that by using relevant ads will help in supporting those activities stated.
A new version of Bible plugin is available!\n\nYou must download this latest version in order to continue reading bible verses as usual.

You will click on any Bible reference verse given in lesson to read it, 

You can also read the verses in any Bible version you want between "Bibiliya Yera (BY)" or "Bibiliya Ijambo ry'Imana (BII)"

You will only need to click on dropdown icon and select version you want to read in whenever verses dialog opened!
Do you want to close this application?
There is a new video you didn\'t watch!
There was an error while loading video.\n\nCheck your internet connection!
All videos content shown here are powered and under YouTube licences
Enter valid email or phone number
Please click on a rating star to rate this app!

Thank you for this rating

We want to reach your expectations for this app!

This will help us to improve!

There is an error while loading video

It may be caused by poor internet connection

Or probably this feature is not available on your device

We apologize for this inconvenience

Why do you see ads?

This app is free to use, however the development, maintenance and all sustenance costs required by this app is large to be self-paid, we hope that by using ads partner to show relevant ads will help us to clear those cost

We're also keen that all ads shown here is relevant to christian moral life

Niba ushaka kwandika umurongo wa Bibiliya mu gitekerezo cyawe, banza kwandika utu tumenyetso << ukurikizeho umurongo wa Bibiliya wanditse neza kandi utangijwe n'inyuti nkuru uherutse utu tumenyesto >>

Urugero:

...soma muri <<Yohana 3:16>> cyangwa <<Zaburi 118:1-18>> cyangwa <<1 Petero 1:2-8>> cyangwa <<Yuda 1,2,3>> ... gutyo

It seems like no story available currently!

Try to click on refresh button at the top
If not listed, no story available now!
Kurura ujyana iburyo kujya kuyindi minsi yahise
Kurura ujyana ibumoso kujya kuyindi minsi ikurikiyeho
Allow Sabbath School Discuss to access accounts on this device\n\nIt\'s just for easy interaction to proceed
Let\'s be together for Sabbath school!
There an error while changing username, we expect this as a temporal error, you try again!
We detect a crucial error that is preventing all access, you will need to provide again your account credentials!

Dufatako ko twese hano dufite imyitwarire y\'imibereho ya gikristo. Niba ubonye igitekerezo cyangwa ikibazo kinyuranye nibi ushobora kugitangaho raporo kugirango dusuzume hanyuma dufate ingamba kuri icyo gitekerezo cyangwa ikibazo
Urashaka gutanga raport kuri iki kibazo cyangwa inyunganizi?
Thank you for this report, we will review this comment and take some actions
You can\'t report a comment you wrote

Access to this content have been disabled


We Apologize for this inconvenience
